translations: n.规格（specification 的复数形式）；说明书

sentences.sentence: It needs steel rolled to 300 different specifications.
sentences.translation: 它需要轧成3百种规格的钢材。

sentences.sentence: You did in fact make late changes to the specifications of the advertisements.
sentences.translation: 你们确实对广告的规格做了后续修改。

sentences.sentence: Replacement is guaranteed if the products are not up to the standard.; We undertake to replace the specifications.
sentences.translation: 产品不合规格，保证退换。
